about_the_game:
This is a visual novel.

Plot Summary

After a great war more than a decade ago, the entire European continent was left in ruins, with countless sectors in need of revitalization.
While the technological revolution spurred rapid global development, some countries found themselves engulfed in unrest and turmoil.
In the heart of the shattered Apennine Peninsula lies Florence, where ancient buildings and narrow streets conceal untold histories.
Meiqu Sonya, an alchemy chemistry researcher from the foggy city, founded a detective agency that quietly lurks in the corners of this city.
Until one day, the mysterious legend of immortality was shattered by the arrival of Snell Aurora, a white-haired witch from the snow country.
The conspiracy begins with the legend of eternal life and ends with a mysterious organization,
extending into an invisible black curtain woven through them.

"Are you... my ally or my enemy?"

Behind each bizarre and absurd tale lies an ancient secret buried in this city. As the investigation deepens, a century-spanning web unfolds across the European continent.

Game Highlights

  • Over twenty exquisite illustrations
  • Cute and rich SD illustrations
  • Voice support for main characters
  • CG appreciation and OST appreciation available
  • Additional story mode available

Character Introduction

Meiqu
Age: 25
Voice Actress:吴哲茹
Description: Usually silent and reserved, always quietly observing her surroundings with a photographic memory.
Tends to be overly stubborn about certain matters and is intolerant of wrongdoers and evil deeds.
Born into a powerful family in Mist City, she went abroad for study during her youth.
During this time, she learned of sudden upheavals at home, leaving only an unsolved mystery akin to a ghost story.
She later liquidated her family assets and left Mist City to uncover the truth behind the enigmatic case.


Snell
Age: 24
Voice Actress:白灯
Description: A noble lady born in the Snow Country with exceptionally high intelligence who loves reading and thinking.
Her white hair led to her being isolated by those around her while living and studying in a foreign country,
and rumors of the "White-Haired Witch" spread. She maintains a calm demeanor and speaks in a gentle tone,
appearing kind but enjoying a sharp tongue.


Sylvia
Age: 18
Voice Actress:闲踏梧桐
Description: A cute and lively girl with a gentle tone and a soft exterior but strong inner resolve.
She has sea-blue eyes and amazed the world with her beauty even before officially becoming the heir.
Her beauty is so breathtaking that some tremble upon seeing her, earning her the title of "The Rose of Florence."


Laura
Age: 25
Voice Actress: 她放慢步调
Description: A true Florentine, graduated from Bristol University in Mist City.
She possesses noble manners and elegant grace, with an enchanting gentleness.
However, when people try to get close, she maintains a subtle air of mystery.

short_description: The fog city detective with exceptional intelligence and keen insight, Mei Qu, one day encounters a snow country girl with snow-colored long hair and witch-like beauty, Snell, at a crime scene. From this moment, their fates begin to intertwine, and an adventurous story unfolds.
